name: Ext_R5_Citation_ci_we_classifier
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Citation.citedArtifact.webLocation.classifier for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Citation.citedArtifact.webLocation.classifier from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Citation|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Code the reason for different URLs, e.g. abstract and full-text
element.definition: A characterization of the object expected at the web location.
element.comment: `Citation.citedArtifact.webLocation.classifier` maps to R4B `Citation.citedArtifact.webLocation.type`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
